GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v6.0.19
GSD.description:
drm/i915/gvt: fix vgpu debugfs clean in remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit ffa83fba2a2ce8010eb106c779378cb3013362c7, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit bc7b0be316aebac42eb9e8e54c984609555944da. For more details please see the references link.
